mapper.select: select * from msgtable where mset=#{mset} and mget=#{mget} or mset=#{mget} and mget=#{mset}
mapper.update: update msgtable set seeint=0 where mset=#{mget} and mget=#{mset}
mapper.select: select count(seeint) from msgtable where mset=#{mget} and mget=#{mset} and seeint=1
select sum(seeint) from msgtable where mget=#{mget}
select sum(seeint) from msgtable where mget=#{mget} or mset=#{mget}
select max(mtime) from msgtable where mset=#{mset} and mget=#{mget} or mget=#{mset} and mset=#{mget}
select mget,mset,gfname,sfname,msg,max(mtime) from msgtable where mget=#{mget} group by mset;
